column1: Little Goat Diner////Hi Aselya - While we are happy to hear that your server was kind and accommodating
column2: it's disappointing to read that the rest of your experience fell short of our high expectations. We apologize for not assisting with your stroller and will share your comments with our team as our goal is to share exciting flavors with our guests. We hope you give us another chance to improve next time and if there is anything further you would like to share please feel free to contact Tina Majethia
